New Players: The last playtest **ended on the 5th of February**. According to the announcement here https://discord.com/channels/1098161688898973696/1098498097128165436/1208146365436133476, we can expect another playtest in **Q2 2024 (April - June 2024)**. In the meantime, you can keep an eye on our https://discord.com/channels/1098161688898973696/1098498097128165436 and https://discord.com/channels/1098161688898973696/1148688397808959548 channels for more information about the game and further upcoming tests. You can also opt-in for the **News** role in https://discord.com/channels/1098161688898973696/1150844897079865376 to be notified when a new announcement is made!
Access Codes 1: To receive your access code, please fill out the **[signup form here](https://s.alchemer.eu/s3/f2cace6128bb)** and **wait at least 24 hours** to receive the email with your code. If you do not receive the email containing the access code within 24 hours, please send a ticket using the option **:key: ACCESS ISSUES** in the https://discord.com/channels/1098161688898973696/1184423095000379482 channel.
Access Codes 2: If **24 hours have passed** since you applied via the signup form and you haven't received the email containing the access code, please send a ticket using the option **:key: ACCESS ISSUES** in the https://discord.com/channels/1098161688898973696/1184423095000379482 channel.
Technical Issues: If you are encountering **:desktop: technical issues** preventing you from playing like crashes and similar stuff please send a report inside the https://discord.com/channels/1098161688898973696/1115998177112358963 forum.
